resources.string: Barangay Cupang Information Dessimination and \n Certificate Issuance System

If you want to access the full functionality of this android application, fill-up the forms the get verified. You will receive an email notification once your requests has been responded by the administrator
Your current requests is still pending. Please wait for the admin to respond to your requests
Your request has been denied by the administrator, please see the admin message to know the reason why your request has been denied. You may submit another requests
Your request has been approved by the administrator, re-open the application to refresh access the verified functionality

These are the list of your submitted feedbacks. You can only submit one feedback a day. Rest assured that if you submit a feedback that is marked as anonymous, your details will not be shown in the admin dashboard.

These are the list of your submitted inquiries. You can add inquiries if you wan to ask question to a specific services of the barangay. You will receive email notification once the administrator respond to your inquiry.

These are the list of your submitted reports. You can only submit three reports a day. Rest assured that if you submit a report that is marked as anonymous, your details will not be shown in the admin dashboard.

These are the list of your submitted requirements in the system. These requirements is used for ordering of certificates, since every certificate have required requirements. Rest assured that the only time the administrator will see your requirements list is when you submit a order to the system. Rest assured that if you delete any of the requirements, the attached image/credentials will also be deleted. Prevent deleting a requirement when you have a pending order.

These are the list of your submitted complaints in the system. Take note you can only edit/delete a complaint when that complaint status is Pending or Declined. When you update a specific report, it automatically change its status to Pending. Please always see the administrator message for the updates of your complaint. You will receive an email and sms notification when the administrator respond to your complaint.

These are the list of your submitted orders in the system. You can only delete the order you submitted when the application status is still "Pending". Please always see the administrator message for the updates of your orders. You will receive an email and sms notification when the administrator made changes to your order.
Click this if you want a custom type

These are the list of approved missing person report. Please contact the user name who posted the said report if you have the information that may help him/her finding the report. You can see the contact information of the use by clicking the name or by writing a comment.

These are the list of your current missing person report. Please take notice that if you update a specific report that is "Approved" by the administrator, the status will automatically change to "Pending". If your submitted report status was "Denied", please see the admin message and re-edit the specific missing person report.

These are the list of your current missing item report. Please take notice that if you update a specific report that is "Approved" by the administrator, the status will automatically change to "Pending". If your submitted report status was "Denied", please see the admin message and re-edit the specific missing item report.

These are the list of your current transaction and it is sorted by the latest to oldest data. Please refrain from booking an order when there is a pending delivery. If you want to have the list of pending delivery, please click add the button.
These are the available order that needs to deliver, Please choose any of the order and take note that you cannot cancel the delivery once you accept the order.

These are the list of approved missing item report. Please contact the user name who posted the said report if you have the information that may help him/her finding the report. You can see the contact information of the use by clicking the name or by writing a comment.
Take note that the certificates available depends on which order type you have chosen. There are certain types of certificate only available for pickup.

Take note that if you did not deliver the specified order within 3 days after the specified received date, the system will automatically marked it as cancelled. These are the following steps that you must follow to complete the delivery transaction.
1. Pickup the order to the barangay hall with your device and valid ID.
2. When the administrator marked your order as On-Going (When you pickup the order), it will sent email and sms notification to the user informing that you have pickup the delivery item.

3. Click the "Start Riding" button to inform the user that you are on the way to the location. Take note that some addresses cannot recognize google map direction, so you must rely on your overall knowledge around the streets since it is required when registering for being a biker.
4. When the resident received the order, you are required to submit a proof by capturing the specified customer while holding their order.
5. When the resident received the order, the system shall need a proof by capturing the specified customer while holding their order.
6. When the resident does not received the order, you are required to return the item to the barangay hall.
Optional: Regardless whether the resident received or does not received the document, you can submit report.
The e-Serbisyo Application allows any verified user to register as a part-time biker in the barangay Cupang. By registering, you are agreeing with the terms and condition of being a delivery biker:
1. Bikers must abide by the barangay official\'s rules and management, and they must not deviate from their responsibilities.
2. Bikers should treat the residents with respect and follow the delivery location\'s instructions.
3. Bikers are not allow to sue Barangay Cupang if accidents happen during the delivery.
4. Bikers when they delivered the specific order to the resident, you are obliged to return the fee for the actual order.
5. When the resident did not received his/her order, you are obliged to return the document to the barangay office. (No compensation)
6. The system does not provide system messaging to the user. Hence, the biker is required to have load in their sim card to have extra communication with the resident.

7. The bikers must be familiar with the streets and purok of barangay officials. They must not rely on the coordinates given in the system because there is a chance that the google map does not recognize the familiar address.

If residents are at fault bikers should immediately report to the barangay to be investigated. \n In addition, riders must not tamper the package in any way. By agreeing this you will agree with the protocols involved. Barangay Cupang will not be in-charged when accidents happen during the delivery.
(PICKUP MODE) - You will pickup the document based on your preferred pickup date.

(DELIVERY MODE) - Once the administrator approved of your request, your order will wait for the bikers to choose your order. If your order does not get picked by our biker on or within 3 days after the specified received date, it will automatically marked as CANCELLED.

(PICKUP MODE) - Once the administrator approved of your request, go to the barangay office to pay and pickup your order on or within 3 days after the specified pickup date. If you did not pickup your order within 3 days after the specified received date, it will automatically marked as "DNR (DID NOT RECEIVED)".
Please make sure that you have the required requirements when proceeding. Go to the certificates section to see the required requirements.

Feedback is important to the barangay officials to determine if their services meet the needs of the residents. You can submit one feedback per day. Barangay officials would love it if you submit feedback regardless of whether it is positive, neutral, or negative feedback.

Reports are used when a verified resident of barangay Cupang sees an illegal activities happening inside the barangay Cupang. With this your submitted reports, the officials can respond to any illegal activities, accidents, and other calamities. You can submit three reports per day. There is an optional send as anonymous if you think that report you submitted can endanger your life.

Complaint/Blotter can now be filed using this application. If you think someone is violating your rights, send a complaint indicating the complainant and the defendant. The administrator can receive complaints in realtime in their system.

Your account is still unverified. Please go to the sidebar (swipe left) and click the unverified text to proceed to the verification process. Click this to get verified or to see current verification status.
